## BundleItemOption.qty property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> The `qty` is deprecated. Use `quantity` instead.
> 

Indicates the quantity of this specific bundle item.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
qty?: Maybe<Scalars['Float']>;
```
